AppFAQ.title: Everything You Need to Know
AppFAQ.description: Get answers to frequently asked questions about using ShipApp template for your mobile app landing page.

faq1.question: How do I get started with the template?
faq1.answer: Simply clone the repository, install dependencies with npm or yarn, and customize the app configuration file with your app's details. The template is ready to use out of the box.

faq2.question: Can I customize the design and colors?
faq2.answer: Absolutely! The template uses Tailwind CSS for styling, making it easy to customize colors, fonts, and layout. You can also modify the configuration file to change content and settings.

faq3.question: Is the template responsive?
faq3.answer: Yes, ShipApp template is fully responsive and works perfectly on all devices - desktop, tablet, and mobile. The design automatically adapts to different screen sizes.

faq4.question: What technologies are used?
faq4.answer: The template is built with Next.js 15, React 19, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and Framer Motion. It also includes internationalization support and dark mode functionality.

faq5.question: Can I use this for commercial projects?
faq5.answer: Yes, you can use ShipApp template for both personal and commercial projects. Create as many app landing pages as you need for your clients or your own apps.

AppFAQ.contactDescription: We're here to help you create the perfect landing page for your mobile app.

Footer.slogan: The modern template for creating professional mobile app landing pages. Fast, responsive, and easy to customize.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.content:
# Privacy Policy

Last updated: January 2025

## Information We Collect

When you use our website or template, we may collect:
- Basic analytics data to improve our services
- Contact information if you reach out to us
- Usage statistics to understand how the template is used

## How We Use Information

We use collected information to:
- Improve our template and documentation
- Respond to support requests
- Analyze usage patterns to enhance user experience

## Data Protection

We are committed to protecting your privacy:
- We never sell your personal information
- We use industry-standard security measures
- We only collect data necessary to improve our services

## Contact Us

If you have questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at privacy@shipapp.com.

userAgreement.title: Terms of Service
userAgreement.content:
# Terms of Service

Last updated: January 2025

## License

By using ShipApp template, you agree to:
- Use the template in accordance with its intended purpose
- Not redistribute the template without permission
- Respect intellectual property rights

## Template Usage

You may:
- Use the template for personal and commercial projects
- Customize the template to fit your needs
- Create multiple landing pages using the template

## Limitations

You may not:
- Resell or redistribute the template as-is
- Claim ownership of the original template code
- Remove attribution where required

## Support

We provide:
- Documentation and setup guides
- Community support through our channels
- Regular updates and improvements

## Contact

For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@shipapp.com.
